data.title: Michael Madsen Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Michael Madsen on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Michael Madsen including Wyatt Earp, Once Upon a Time...in Hollywood, andâ¦
data.text:
Moody Foodie

When the restaurant receives a bad review from a food critic, the Belchers fear that the negative press will keep customers away. When Bob shows up at the criticâs house for a redo, his plan quickly spirals out of control when the kids and his fellow restaurant owners show up to support him.

Family Business

A dangerous criminal from Danny's past comes back to seek revenge and kidnaps Jackie. Meanwhile, Jaime meets his new partner, while a young officer is shaken after he accidentally shoots an innocent man. Michael Madsen and Corbin Bleu guest stars.

Na Hala A Ka Makua

McGarrett and Danny are kidnapped by an escaped convict who wants Five-0 to prove his innocence. Meanwhile, Danny must deal with Grace after she punches someone at school.

Day 8: 2:00 P.M. - 3:00 P.M.

Emotions run high as the harrowing day climaxes with resolute President Taylor closing in on a world-changing peace treaty and a vengeful Jack Bauer taking matters into his own hands for one last and unforgettable job.
